column5: hi ladies and gents.. Im a new to ice fishing and I order vexilar fl22..  My question is any advice if this is good for ice fishing or prepare other brands? what are the odds?  thnx bfisherman
It's only good up to 60ft depth.  I had marcum lx5, vex fl-18 and Lowrance x67c is the winner for me. Love the graph mode.
I'm still ice fishing with a Vex FL8 and I am lovin it..... :-)
I had marcum lx5, vex fl-18 and Lowrance x67c is the winner for me. Love the graph mode.     I also have the X67C - and I wouldn't trade it for any of the other ice machines!  Don
wow so i guess its a good buy then for me..
